slogan: Writex.io â€“ the full potential of the writing journey at your fingertips, experience a truly immersive writing experience, effortless publishing, and detailed collection statistics to help you make your mark as an author.
logicDescription: All logic is executed within sagas. Upon clicking the button, an action is dispatched. The saga, which is listening for this action, updates the store by dispatching another action. This process demonstrates the asynchronous capabilities of sagas and the application.
pluginsDescription: This is a dynamically loaded plugin that enables the lazy loading of components, reducers, and sagas for dynamic injection.
